generatedTitle: Japanese School System: From Preschool to High School

extractFactDictList.question: When does the academic year begin in Japan?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In Japan, the academic year begins in April and ends in March of the following year.

extractFactDictList.question: When do children start preschool in Japan?
extractFactDictList.sentence: It is not uncommon for children to start preschool by the time they are around 2.5 to 3 years.

extractFactDictList.question: When do children start elementary school in Japan?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Children start the first grade of elementary school in the year that they have their sixth birthday on or before April 1st of that year.
extractFactDictList.phrase: In the year they have their sixth birthday on or before April 1st

extractFactDictList.question: What grades does junior high school consist of in Japan?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Junior high school consists of grades 7 to High School (Kōkō)
